<!--
IMAGE SOURCING DECISION GUIDE:

For PRODUCT REVIEWS, use this priority:

1. BEST: Actual product image from Amazon
   - Go to Amazon product page
   - Right-click main image → Copy image address
   - Use: https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/[ID].jpg
   - Credit: "Product image courtesy of Amazon.com"

2. GOOD: Manufacturer press release image
   - Check company newsroom or media kit
   - Verify license allows editorial use
   - Credit: "Image courtesy of [Manufacturer Name]"

3. ACCEPTABLE: AI-generated product image
   - Only if actual product image unavailable
   - Prompt: "Professional product photography of [product name], white background, studio lighting"
   - Credit: "AI Generated Image"

4. LAST RESORT: Relevant Unsplash photo
   - Search specific product or category
   - NOT generic tech images
   - Credit: "Photo by [Name] on Unsplash"

NEVER:
- Generic stock photos unrelated to product
- Reuse same image from another article
- Use competitor product images
-->

**Pre-Publishing Checklist:**
- [ ] **Web search performed** for recent reviews and news about product
- [ ] **Product ASIN verified** - link goes to correct product
- [ ] **Specs verified** against manufacturer website
- [ ] **3+ review sources** consulted and cited
- [ ] **Affiliate tracking ID present** in all Amazon URLs (?tag=trendytecht0a-20)
- [ ] **Amazon URLs use CORRECT format** - https://www.amazon.com (with "www.")
- [ ] **NO static pricing** anywhere in article
- [ ] **Image is product-specific** (not generic category image)
- [ ] **Image credit correct** (Amazon, manufacturer, or AI)
- [ ] **All source links work** (clicked each one)
- [ ] **Date is current** (not in the past!)
- [ ] **Facts cross-referenced** across multiple sources

**Amazon Link Format - CRITICAL:**
- ✅ **CORRECT:** https://www.amazon.com/dp/ASIN?tag=trendytecht0a-20
- ❌ **WRONG:** https://amazon.com/dp/ASIN?tag=trendytecht0a-20 (missing www.)
- ⚠️ **Links without "www." may not work properly or track correctly**

**CRITICAL Amazon Rules:**
- ❌ NEVER include specific prices in body text
- ❌ NEVER show prices in frontmatter
- ✅ ALWAYS use "Check price on Amazon" CTAs
- ✅ ALWAYS include affiliate tracking ID: ?tag=trendytecht0a-20
- ✅ ALWAYS use https://www.amazon.com (with "www.")
- ✅ ALWAYS include disclaimer about prices changing

**Image Guidelines for Product Reviews:**
1st choice: Actual product image from Amazon
2nd choice: Manufacturer press release image
3rd choice: AI-generated product image
LAST resort: Specific Unsplash search (not generic!)
